We haven't spent any time on it and, therefore, we just have not taken a position. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Michael Lindenberger, Dallas Morning News - Media [109] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Thank you very much. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Operator [110] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- (Operator Instructions) We'll go next to Andrea Ahles with the Star-Telegram. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Andrea Ahles, Star-Telegram - Media [111] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hi, Gary. I was wondering if you -- I heard you talk on the call about the Love Field case with Delta that's in front of a federal judge. Delta was asked last week if they plan to appeal the ruling, if it goes against them. And I wanted to ask you the same question. Will you appeal -- will Southwest appeal the judge's ruling if it goes against Southwest? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [112] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Well, really, I want to honor the judge's order here and comply, first of all. We're looking forward to the decision, and would expect that hopefully soon, and I think we'll respond accordingly at that time. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Andrea Ahles, Star-Telegram - Media [113] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- You're not willing to come out like Delta did and say that, yes, we definitely plan to appeal this to the circuit court if the judge rules against us? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [114] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I'm not going to not comply with the judge's order to not comment on this case. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Andrea Ahles, Star-Telegram - Media [115] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- All right. Thank you. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Operator [116] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- And we'll take our next question from David Koenig with the Associated Press. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- David Koenig, Associated Press - Analyst [117] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hi, folks. Two questions, because I think the first one's probably a quick answer. But can you say what your early load factors are on those international flights out of Houston? And also, on the cost side, that labor cost line really stands out. And even if that includes the pilots' ratification bonus, even if it does, you're still up 14.4%. And I'm wondering if that is going to be a trend that investors should expect to see going forward. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [118] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Well, David, on the latter, that's really profit sharing that's driving that. So, I would welcome that kind of increase. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- David Koenig, Associated Press - Analyst [119] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Okay. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [120] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- But, yes, that's our variable pay component. When the Company does well, our employees do even better. I talked long enough, I forgot your first easy question. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- David Koenig, Associated Press - Analyst [121] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Houston Hobby load factors on the international? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [122] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Well, I can report this: We've got -- by far, the majority of our destinations are leisure destinations. Those load factors are consistently very high. These are brand-new markets. I'm expecting us to have periods of time, though, when we have pretty light loads. The only markets that we've typically seen softer loads than we would like would be the more business markets, which is primarily Mexico City. And some of the flight times there aren't optimal yet with the slot controls that they have in place. But the -- I was there on Thursday, and virtually every flight going out that day was full. So I think the early returns are pretty much what we would have expected, and I think we'll do very well in that market. The fares have been very high. We're going to come in with famous low fares, and we'd very much expect to have the Southwest effect to kick in. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- David Koenig, Associated Press - Analyst [123] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- All right. Thanks. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Operator [124] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- And we have time for one more question. We'll take our last question from Jeffrey Dastin with Reuters. (Operator Instructions) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Jeffrey Dastin, Reuters - Analyst [125] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hello? Is this better? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [126] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- We can hear you now. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Jeffrey Dastin, Reuters - Analyst [127] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Okay, great, great. I was trying to speak for a couple moments there. Well, thank you for taking the call. Has Southwest finished its response to the Justice Department's civil investigative demand? And can it give any other update on where that process stands now? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Gary Kelly, Southwest Airlines Company - Chairman, President and CEO [128] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I think the only thing that I can appropriately comment on is that we're fully complying with the civil investigative demand. Certainly, we worked hard, and turned over a lot of information. But as to exactly where that stands, I can't really comment any further. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Jeffrey Dastin, Reuters - Analyst [129] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Thank you very much. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Operator [130] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- At this time, I would like to turn the call back to Ms. Rutherford for any closing remarks. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Linda Rutherford, Southwest Airlines Company - VP of Communications and Outreach [131] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Thank you all very much. Of course, if there's any follow-up questions, don't hesitate to call us. Or you can always reach out at SWAmedia.com, and we'll take care of you. Thanks, and have a great day. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Operator [132] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- And this concludes today's call. Thank you for joining.

Event.eventTitle: Q3 2015 Southwest Airlines Co Earnings Call
